Package bdd.entities

Class Employer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdd.entities.Employer
  • public class Employer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the table "employers" of the database as an application entity

      • Employer

        public Employer​(int id,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String birthDate,
                char sex,
                java.lang.String role)
        A Employer object represents the table employer from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The identifiant of the employer in the database
        lastName - The last name of the employer
        firstName - The first name of the employer
        birthDate - The birth date of the employer
        sex - The sex of the employer (M/F)
        role - The employer role in the hardware store
